articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Important Speech Calling for Increasing Function and Role of Party Cells
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Important Speech Calling for Increasing Function and Role of Party Cells
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un made an important speech calling for decisively increasing the function and role of the party cells as required by the developing party and revolution at the Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Kim Jong Un said in his speech that the party, army and people of the DPRK are united closer under the immortal flags bearing the portraits of smiling great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and advancing straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism true to their behests.
					
					We should further develop the WPK into a powerful staff, firmly united with one ideology and purpose and rooted deep among the popular masses and surely build on this land the best power and a people's paradise to which the world will look up with the might of the harmonious whole of the party and the people, taking the undying feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in party building as assets of eternal value, he stressed.
					
					If only the party cells remain strong, the party will remain unshaken in any adversity and there is nothing to fear and nothing impossible, he said, and went on:
					
					An important task facing the party cells at present is to prepare the party members as true Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists and genuine comrades and comrades-in-arms of our party and do the work with the masses well so that broad masses may get closely linked with our party with ties of blood. 
					
					An important task facing the party cells at present when a dynamic general advance is now under way for building a thriving socialist nation is to energetically organize and mobilize the party members and other people for implementing the party's policies.
					
					We should translate into a shining reality the noble desire of Kim Jong Il, who energetically made the super-intense forced march till the last moments of his life to bring the people wealth and comfort under socialism. This is the most important revolutionary task facing the party at present.
					
					In order to bring about an epochal turn in building an economic giant and improving the standard of people's living, the party organizations at all levels, party cells in particular, should successfully perform their roles as death-defying corps and scouts for implementing the party's policies and dynamically conduct the organizational and political work to give rise to the hot wind of Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					The party cells should galvanize the party members and core masses into action so that a person may rouse ten persons and ten people may motivate a hundred and innovations at a unit may lead to other units.
					
					They should direct particular efforts to the work with the youth in organizing and mobilizing the masses for the implementation of the party policies.
					
					They should make the flames of the industrial revolution in the new century, the torch for breaking through ultramodern science and technology kindled by Kim Jong Il flare up more furiously in all fields and at all units.
					
					If the party cells are to creditably perform the heavy missions and duties they assumed before the times and the revolution, it is necessary for the cell secretaries to enhance their responsibilities and roles. 
					
					Kim Jong Un in his speech said the Central Committee of the WPK firmly believed that all the party cell secretaries and party cadres would creditably perform the honorable missions and duties they assumed before the party and the revolution, keenly aware that they were holding the party flag of Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Closing Address at Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Closing Address at Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un made a closing address at the Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of the WPK.
					He said that the conference would be clearly recorded in the party history as it is a gathering which provided an important landmark in increasing the fighting capability of the party in every way as required by the new historic era for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, and achieving a final victory in building a thriving country.
					
					The great Comrade Kim Il Sung's and Comrade Kim Jong Il's revolutionary idea is a science and it is the truth confirmed in the practice of the Korean revolution that if one does as taught by them, one is sure to win despite any difficulty and trial, he noted, and continued:
					
					It is necessary to further strengthen the party organizationally and ideologically and work out an operation and design for everything as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il did and thus make steady leap forward and innovations in the revolution and construction, taking their immortal ideas on party building and feats as steadfast guidelines and all-powerful treasured sword.
					
					The participants in the conference and the cell secretaries of the whole party should bear in mind the spirit of the conference, thoroughly embody it in the party cell work and thus give full play to the vitality of the conference in the gigantic practice of building a thriving country.
					
					He declared the conference closed, convinced that all participants in the conference and the cell secretaries of the whole party would creditably perform their revolutionary duties in the sacred struggle to bring earlier the prosperity of the country, united close around the Party Central Committee.

articles.title: Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK Closes
articles.content:
Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK Closes
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) closed Tuesday.
					Speeches were made at the second-day conference
					
					Speaking at the conference were Jo Jong Suk, secretary of the party cell of the Management Station of Revolutionary Battle Site of Mt. Paektu, Yun Yong Bok, secretary of the party cell of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, Yun In Dok, secretary of the party cell of North Hamgyong Provincial People's Hospital, Jang Myong Sok, chief secretary of the Sinchon County Party Committee, Ri Man Gon, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, and others.
					
					Jong U Yong, secretary of the party cell of the Fourth Shop of the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, Yom Yong Gil, secretary of the branch party committee of the Tools Shop of the Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory, Jong Kwang Bok, secretary of the party cell of the Rodong Sinmun Office, and others made written speeches.
					
					The speakers were unanimous in praising the leadership feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu associated with their fields and units, and analyzed and reviewed achievements, experience and defects in their party work in the past.
					
					They made pledges to glorify generation after generation the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's idea on party-building and their feats, bring about an epochal turn in the party work under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and thus contribute to turning the party into an unbreakable integral whole with firm center of leadership and unity, a genuine mother party that is linked with the people through one blood vessel and a guiding force that leads the building of a thriving nation.
					
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, made an important speech.
					
					The participants extended greatest glory and warmest thanks to Kim Jong Un, who has further strengthened the WPK shining with the august names and feats of the great Generalissimos, remarkably enhanced its leadership role and thus provided the undying important programme to effect a great swing in the revolution and construction.
					
					A letter of pledge to the WPK was adopted at the conference.
					
					Kim Jong Un made a closing address.

articles.title: Scientific Researches Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific Researches Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is directing big efforts to scientific researches to bring about a radical turn in building an economic giant.
					Kim Chaek University of Technology plays a significant role in this campaign, making lots of scientific achievements urgently needed to develop the economy.
					
					According to an official of the university, hundreds of its teachers and researchers are now engaged in research activities at different main sectors of the national economy.
					
					Weld engineering researchers developed and introduced a new kind of build-up electrode at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, thus increasing more than 10 times the durability of a molding screw vital to ammonia compound gas production.
					
					Some of those researchers have developed a new kind of distemper with mixtures of compound oxidized steel paint and compound paint, paving a way for its mass-production. This quality and environment-friendly compound oxidized steel paint costs low, and wastes coming from its production can be used as substitutes for fertilizer.
					
					Teachers and researchers of the university also have invented valuable technologies at the Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory, which are applicable to manufacturing modern trolley buses. 
					
					Meanwhile, they are working hard to modernize the Pyongyang Pig Farm and the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute, while intensifying the research into low-cost fuel for dwellers.

articles.title: UN "Resolution" Reminiscent of "Munich Pact": Social Scientist
articles.content:
UN "Resolution" Reminiscent of "Munich Pact": Social Scientist
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The UN Security Council recently cooked up a "resolution on sanctions" against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea over its satellite launch, at the initiative of the United States.
					The "resolution" is reminiscent of the "Munich Pact," which was concluded in 1938, aiming to deprive a sovereign state of its territory, a social scientist of the DPRK said.
					
					Kim Ha Il, a researcher of the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					The prevailing situation over the DPRK's satellite launch clearly proves that there is a limit to capabilities of parties concerned in their efforts to fairly handle the issue and avert aggravation of the situation.
					
					The DPRK has never expected that the U.S. and its followers' hostile policy towards the DPRK would be readjusted by the efforts of the parties concerned but regarded it as a truth that it should settle accounts with the U.S. by dint of strength only.
					
					It is as clear as noonday that if the U.S. is allowed to resort to the arbitrary and high-handed practices of violating the sovereignty of the DPRK, it will impose a more shameful indignity upon the DPRK and ask those parties concerned for more crucial concession.
					
					As part of its strategy for world supremacy, the U.S. is now focusing its military forces on the East Asian region embracing regional powers, creating an acute situation of military confrontation.
					
					Illogical is the assertion that the DPRK's satellite launch should meet denunciation and sanctions because it gives an excuse to the U.S. and its allies for making such military actions. 
					
					It is as ridiculous as one advising others not to breed fowl for fear of being stolen, while one breeds a cow in one's house.
					
					A burglar should be clubbed to death.
					
					The results of the "Munich Pact" teach a lesson that one-step concession to hegemonic forces leads to one hundred-step concessions and to death in the long run. 
					
					The DPRK can never allow its legitimate right to launch satellites for peaceful purposes to be violated by others like the disgraceful fate forced upon Sudet area by the "pact". Moreover, it is not like a weak nation that turned into a sacrifice to the "pact".
					
					Time will show what kinds of powerful and physical countermeasure the DPRK will take to defend the nation's dignity and sovereignty and how it will bring to naught the U.S. antagonistic conception and attempt.
					
					Those parties who sided with the U.S. in cooking up the "resolution" should ponder over the consequences to be entailed therefrom.

articles.title: U.S. Poses Constant Nuclear Threats to DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Poses Constant Nuclear Threats to DPRK
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has stepped up its moves to stifle the DPRK since the mid 20th century to seize upper-hand in the Asia-Pacific region.
					After igniting a war against the DPRK on June 25, 1950, the U.S. introduced nuclear weapons to the Korean front in August the same year and held several drills for dropping them in the northern part of Korea.
					
					It reduced south Korea into the biggest nuclear depot and advanced nuclear base in the Far East and staged nuclear war exercises against the DPRK in south Korea and its vicinity every year with huge nuclear weapons involved, openly posing nuclear threats.
					
					It branded the DPRK as a target of preemptive nuclear attack several times in the "report on nuclear posture".
					
					It conducted a series of sub-critical nuclear tests under the pretext of "ensuring the safety of nuclear arsenals" while spending enormous funds in modernizing nuclear facilities.
					
					This proves that the U.S. has constantly sought to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					A danger of nuclear war has increased on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. moves to hold world hegemony by monopolizing nuclear weapons and dominating the field of strategic offensive weapons.
					
					The U.S. has directed its efforts into rounding off preparations for an anti-DPRK war, turning south Korea and Japan into its advanced bases for preempting a nuclear attack.
					
					It was reported by a south Korean paper that the U.S. strategic command worked out OPLAN 8010-08 in January of 2009, which envisaged attacks on the DPRK's military capability, military and state leadership and nuclear and missile complexes with the combination of nuclear and conventional weapons.
					
					It is the U.S. that pays only lip-service to detente in the Korean Peninsula and instead steps up preparations for a nuclear war under the pretext of the non-existent threats from the DPRK.
					
					The U.S.-masterminded "sanctions" under the signboard of coping with "the north's threats" can never help it cover up its deceptive and criminal nature.
					
					The more the U.S. seeks hostility towards the DPRK, the stronger the latter's nuclear deterrent for self-defense will become. The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will clear the world of the imperialists.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the situation and behave with discretion.

articles.title: U.S., Procrustes of Modern Version
articles.content:
U.S., Procrustes of Modern Version
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The United Nations Security Council on January 22 cooked up an anti-DPRK "resolution" over its peaceful satellite launch, at the initiative of the United States.
					It is the general knowledge that ballistic missile technology is used in launching satellite.
					
					This being a hard fact, the "resolution" was approved by those countries which have launched most of the satellites in the world, pressurized by the U.S.
					
					It clearly shows that the United Nations is playing in the hands of the U.S.
					
					After the September 11 incident, the U.S. has imprudently staged wars of aggression as if it were a "license for igniting war".
					
					Through the Iraqi war, unleashed by the U.S. under the name of the UNSC, the world people looked into the U.S. scheme to dominate the Middle East with 65 percent of the world's oil deposits.
					
					That is why world's media would say that all of wars, forced by the U.S. under the pretext of defending "human rights" and "peace", were only for its interests, prompted by its ambition for world domination.
					
					The U.S. is now employing the name of the UNSC to drive the situation of the Korean Peninsula to confrontation and war.
					
					Such imprudent behavior reminds one of a tale of Procrustes, a robber in Greek mythology who killed passers-by on an iron bed by stretching their bodies or cutting off their limbs.
					
					The U.S., Procrustes of modern version, infringes upon the sovereignty and interests of independent nations at will, by using the UNSC as such bed.
					
					The DPRK's satellite launch is an exercise of legitimate right of a sovereign state, which never goes against international law.
					
					It would be a mistake for the U.S. to think that it can deprive the DPRK of its right to satellite launch or break its will through the "resolution" on tightening "sanctions".
					
					If the UNSC continues to remain a sacrifice to the U.S. interests, it cannot but be called "Procrustean bed". The UNSC had better change its name into the U.S. Security Council.
						
					
					By Kim No Ul

articles.title: U.S. to Blame for Nuclear Issue on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. to Blame for Nuclear Issue on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- 55 years have passed since Jan. 29, 1958 when the U.S. formally declared it would ship nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					Even since the appearance of NPT, the U.S. continued shipping nukes into south Korea in a gross violation of NPT, turning it into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East 
					
					The U.S. has staged ceaseless exercises of various forms for a nuclear war targeted against the DPRK in south Korea and its vicinity since late in the 1960s, steadily escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					It was already during the Korean War that the U.S. worked out a plan to create the zone of radioactive corridor on the peninsula and frantically staged maneuvers under the simulated conditions of an actual nuclear attack on areas of the DPRK in a bid to carry out the plan.
					
					This goes to prove that the nuclear issue on the peninsula was spawned by the U.S. as it has shipped nukes into south Korea and persistently pursued a policy of nuclear war since half a century ago.
					
					It is the U.S. which is chiefly to blame for the nuclear issue on the peninsula and has driven the situation into an extreme phase where it is hard to settle the issue.
					
					The DPRK has made every possible effort to seek a peaceful solution to the nuclear issue on the peninsula, a product of the nuclear threat of the U.S.
					
					The DPRK has regarded it as its nuclear policy to denuclearize the peninsula and striven hard to implement it even since the DPRK had access to nuclear deterrence as a bold decision to safeguard the dignity and security of the country and the nation from the increasing nuclear blackmail of the U.S.
					
					However, the U.S. has steadily escalated its actions hostile to the DPRK such as nuclear blackmail, disregarding all efforts of the DPRK and abusing even international law as a lever for justifying its highhanded and arbitrary practices.
					
					The U.S. recently cooked up the UNSC's "resolution 2087 on sanctions" in an effort to deprive the DPRK of its independent right to satellite launch.
					
					The U.S. persistent pursuance of its nuclear war policy against the DPRK is aimed at stifling it economically and disabling its armed forces and thus bringing it under its control at any cost.
					
					Any effort to settle the nuclear issue on the peninsula is little short of wasting time on an empty talk as long as the U.S. sticks to its nuclear policy of regarding nuclear weapons as a basic means to stifle the DPRK.
					
					That is why the DPRK drew a final conclusion that it is impossible to denuclearize the peninsula unless the world is denuclearized.
					
					The present situation once again teaches the Korean people the truth that the sovereignty of the country and the nation must be defended by their own efforts.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will orient and subordinate the efforts for building an economic power, conquering the outer space and bolstering up the military capability and the deterrence to defend the security of the country to an all-out action to smash the moves of the U.S. and other forces hostile to it.
					
					The world will clearly witness how the DPRK will punish all the hostile forces and win a final victory.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korea to Heed DPRK's Warning
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korea to Heed DPRK's Warning
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its allies through the UN Security Council adopted a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, a serious challenge to the sovereignty of an independent state and its legitimate right.
					The "resolution" represents the height of the hostile policy toward the DPRK and showdown with it being stepped up by those forces displeased with the DPRK's rising international prestige and its peaceful economic development.
					
					Problem is that the south Korean group of traitors took the lead in adopting the "resolution".
					
					Soon after satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was shot to space, the group of traitors called for a "strong counteraction" and "harsher sanctions", speaking loudly of a "provocation" to the international community.
					
					The group called at the U.S. and Japanese masters and toured surrounding countries to beg for the effectuation of the UN "sanctions" against the DPRK. The group even went so impudent as to work out a "proposal for imposing sanctions against the north" and submitting it to the UN.
					
					The group took the satellite launch as an opportunity for resorting to sycophancy and escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, far from lauding it as a special event in the nation's 5,000-year long history which demonstrated the dignity and might of the nation.
					
					The despicable behavior of the group bereft of even an iota of reason, to say nothing of nationality, clearly shows its fear of the tremendous mental power of the Koreans and massive national power of the DPRK.
					
					By taking an active part in kicking up the "sanctions" racket against the DPRK the group seeks to save its poor face and maintain its almost bankrupt policy for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					The group showed before the world that it is made up of traitors and confrontation maniacs who prolong their remaining days with sycophancy and treachery.
					
					As shown by a historical lesson, nothing can be expected from those who are intent on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen. It will, on the contrary, deteriorate the north-south ties.
					
					The south Korean group should never hope for sitting with the DPRK unless it repeals the policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					"Sanctions" precisely mean a declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK already stated to the world that it will react to the confrontation elements' provocation with immediate retaliatory blows and their war of aggression with a grand and just war for national reunification.
					
					The group of traitors should heed this warning and not go indiscreet.
					
					The provokers will meet only merciless retaliatory blows.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution Detains Reunification Champion
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution Detains Reunification Champion
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Seoul District Prosecutor's Office detained and indicted Jo Yong Sam, according to the south Korean CBS on Jan. 27. Jo visited the DPRK in 1995 to take part in the grand festival for national reunification marking the 50th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					The prosecution authorities arrested Jo on charges of the violation of the ill-famed "Security Law" as soon as he returned home from abroad.
					
					The fascist authorities indicted him for the mere reason that he visited the north without an approval of the "government" to participate in the 6th Pan-National Rally, and called for reunification by federal formula and repeal of the "Security Law".

articles.title: Koreans' Organization in China Denounces UNSC's "Resolution"
articles.content:
Koreans' Organization in China Denounces UNSC's "Resolution"
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Jan. 26 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and their allies for cooking up a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					The statement noted:
					
					The U.S. imperialists and their allies fabricated the UNSC's "resolution" while taking issue with the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2. This was a serious infringement on the DPRK's sovereignty and a violation of international law on the use of space for peaceful purposes.
					
					The successful satellite launch was a great auspicious event of the nation which boosted the DPRK's dignity and honor, and a great victory of its space development plan for peaceful purposes recognized by the world.
					
					This being a hard fact, the U.S. and its allies fabricated the "resolution on sanctions" again by using the UN while groundlessly pulling up the DPRK.
					
					What enrages us most is that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea made desperate efforts to extend "sanctions" on the compatriots in collusion with its master.
					
					The Lee group is working desperately even at the close of its office even though it had been engaged in all kinds of intrigues to do harm to the compatriots. The Korean nation will never pardon the group.
					
					The officials of the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and all other Koreans in China will turn out to foil the reckless moves for confrontation with the DPRK being conducted by the group and other forces currying favor with the U.S., the statement stressed.

articles.title: Koreans in China Denounce UNSC for Serving U.S.
articles.content:
Koreans in China Denounce UNSC for Serving U.S.
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Jo Kuk Je, director of the Secretariat of the General Association of Koreans in China, made public a statement on Jan. 23 in denunciation of the UN Security Council which fabricated the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, toeing the U.S. policy.
					It is better to rename the UNSC "puppet council of the U.S.", the statement ridiculed, adding:
					
					The UN has an inglorious history in which it played the role of a waiting maid for the U.S. in its illegal wars of aggression. 
					
					When the U.S. imperialists, the robbers, ignited the June 25 Korean War, they hurled armies of 15 satellite countries, the south Korean puppet army and even the Japanese militarists into the war by abusing the signboard of the UN. 
					
					They have made it practice to hurl troops of some of their allies under the helmets of the UN forces into invasions, armed interventions, operations to topple governments, terrorism and subversive activities and sabotages against sovereign states in different parts of the world. 
					
					Consequently, neither the UN Charter nor the world public opinion could prevent the Afghan and Iraqi wars by the U.S. 
					
					The UNSC dominated by the U.S. exists only in name as it has such disgraceful history. 
					
					Kim Chong Su, chief of a branch of the Jilin Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, on Jan. 24 released a statement titled "UNSC is nothing but a marionette of the U.S."
					
					He said the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK is no more than a waste paper.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution" Denounced by Chongryon Official
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution" Denounced by Chongryon Official
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Monday made public a statement titled "We denounce the unreasonable 'resolution' of the UNSC". 
					The statement urged the UNSC to make an apology to the DPRK for wantonly violating the sovereignty of the DPRK pursuant to the U.S. anti-DPRK policy, and immediately repeal all the "resolutions" that were unreasonably adopted. 
					
					It is as clear as noonday that the recent "resolution" was an act of bitter hostility aimed to illegalize satellite launch for peaceful purposes and prevent the DPRK from developing the economy and bolstering up national defence, and to isolate and stifle it, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					The south Korean group of traitors took the lead in fabricating the "resolution", committing another grave crime in the nation's history. 
					
					The south Korean authorities should refrain from such traitorous act as seeking the stand-off with fellow countrymen with the support of outside forces after being forsaken by the nation, and stop at once the anti-DPRK confrontation moves. 
					
					No force on earth can check the Korean people dynamically advancing to a final victory in the all-out action of justice for defending sovereignty of the country, with confidence of the justness of their cause under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Slovenia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Slovenia
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian preparatory committee for commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Maribor City on Jan. 22.
					Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize various politico-cultural events for introducing the immortal revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il in Ljubljana and other places of Slovenia during the period from Jan. 25 to Feb. 18.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Serbia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Serbia
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A Serbian preparatory committee for commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star" was formed in Belgrade on Jan. 22.
					The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize a variety of politico-cultural events including meeting and seminar from February 1 to 20.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Sri Lanka
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan preparatory committee for commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Colombo on January 19.
					W. A. Duminduwardane, chairman of the Committee of Self-Reliance Studies in Sri Lanka, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the human cause of independence on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: French Organization's Organ on DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
French Organization's Organ on DPRK's Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- "Asia Handbook", the organ of the France-Asia Association, carried an article about the DPRK's satellite launch in its fourth quarter issue in 2012.
					The article said:
					
					The DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 by carrier rocket Unha-3.
					
					The U.S. also notified the appearance of the DPRK's satellite in an orbit around the earth.
					
					The DPRK ranked itself among satellite launching countries whose number is extremely limited in the world.
					
					Its successful satellite launch shows the high rocket technology level of the country.
					
					The authority of Kim Jong Un, leader of the DPRK, has risen considerably with the successful satellite launch.
					
					The article added that the French policy towards the DPRK is not appropriate.

articles.title: British Organizations Urge Withdrawal of UNSC's "Resolution"
articles.content:
British Organizations Urge Withdrawal of UNSC's "Resolution"
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association strongly demanded the UNSC withdraw the "resolutions" against the DPRK and apologize to it.
					The organizations released a joint statement on January 23.
					
					The joint statement expressed resentment at the UNSC, which adopted the reactionary, unfair and criminal "resolution" infringing on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					The "resolution" is the height of hypocrisy and double standards, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The countries which launched most of the world's satellites have taken an issue with the DPRK's satellite launch. It is a brigandish logic that "you should not do as I do but do as I say".
					
					The U.S. imperialists and their followers are considering space development as a privilege granted to some countries only, regarding that other countries should be prevented from becoming a new space developer and be punished if they do so.
					
					The member countries of the U.N. Security Council are puppets, henchmen and apple polishers of the U.S imperialists.
					
					The statement fully supported the right of the DPRK to develop space for building an economic giant.
					
					It called upon the Korean friends, followers of the Juche idea and the Songun idea and all other people in the world desirous of independence and justice to get firmly united to defend the DPRK and have the unreasonable UNSC's "resolution" cancelled.

articles.title: Romanian Political Figure Condemns UNSC's "Resolution"
articles.content:
Romanian Political Figure Condemns UNSC's "Resolution"
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, in a statement on January 23 denounced the UNSC's "resolution".
					The UNSC adopted a brigandish "resolution" encroaching on the DPRK's right to use space for peaceful purposes under the manipulation of the U.S., he said, and went on:
					
					The UNSC's "resolution" is a product of high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists from A to Z and the height of double standards seriously abusing the fair international law.
					
					The progressives aspiring after justice strongly reject the UNSC's "resolution" against the DPRK, a peace-loving country with ability of manufacturing and launching satellites.
					
					The U.S. should disband the "UN Command" in south Korea without delay and withdraw its aggression forces including nuclear weapons from south Korea unconditionally.
					
					The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania fully supports the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry which denounced and rejected the illegal "resolution" of the UNSC.
					
					It also extends solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people legitimately exercising the right to use space for peaceful purposes, undeterred by any sanctions and pressure of the imperialists.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Venezuela
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela on January 24.
					The work, a speech made by him on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					Clarified in the work is an idea that the Korean People's Army, which registered one victory after another, has assured the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and this provided a sure guarantee for the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Songun Revolution Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Songun Revolution Lauded
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- It has been 10 years after leader Kim Jong Il made public his celebrated work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution".
					The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), deals with the essence, features, validity and vitality of the Songun (military-first) policy and the theoretical and practical issues arousing in pursuing the policy.
					
					Referring to the great feats performed by Kim Jong Il with this policy, Ri Hong Su, a department head of the Philosophy Faculty of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					"Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime bolstered up the DPRK's military capabilities in every way and guided the showdown with the U.S.-led imperialists and the building of a thriving country to victory by dint of the great Songun policy.
					
					He formulated the Songun policy as the basic mode of politics under socialism and applied it in all fields of society for the first time in history. This is the greatest of his feats performed for the Songun revolution.
					
					The Songun politics is unthinkable apart from his august name."
					
					Choe Kum Chun, a candidate academician of the university, stressed that thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun policy the DPRK turned into a military power, a full-fledged nuclear state and a satellite manufacturing and launching state.
					
					Prof. and Dr. Kim Chun Gun of the same university said:
					
					"Leader Kim Jong Il's guidance over the Songun revolution developed the DPRK into a politico-ideological power, in which all the people are closely untied as one in mind, and ushered in a new era of building a thriving country.
					
					It also opened up a new phase for Korea's reunification by providing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration between the north and the south and reliably ensured the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en la IV Conferencia de Secretarios de Celula del PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en la IV Conferencia de Secretarios de Celula del PTC
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronuncio un discurso programatico en la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del Partido destacando la necesidad de elevar decisivamente la funcion y papel de las celulas del partido de acuerdo con las demandas del partido y la revolucion en desarrollo. 
					El dijo que nuestro partido, ejercito y pueblo estan unidos con mas firmeza bajo la bandera de las efigies del Sol imperecedero del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y marchan directamente por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo en cumplimiento del legado de ellos. 
					
					Tenemos que fortalecer el PTC como poderoso Estado Mayor combativo, arraigado profundamente en las masas populares y unido compactamente con la unica ideologia y voluntad, considerando las imborrables proezas del Presidente y el Dirigente realizadas en la construccion del partido como patrimonios eternos, y levantar sin falta con el poderio de la unidad monolitica entre el partido y el pueblo un paraiso del pueblo, o sea, la mejor potencia que sea admirada por todo el mundo, puntualizo.
					
					Si son fuertes las celulas del partido, no se vacilara el partido en cualesquier circunstancias ni habra nada temible ni inalcanzable, subrayo.
					
					Prosiguio que la tarea importante que se presenta ante las celulas en la actualidad es preparar a los militantes del partido como verdaderos kimilsungistas-kimjongilistas y camaradas y companeros de armas del partido y laborar bien con amplias masas populares para vincularlas con el partido con el sentimiento de consanguineos. 
					
					En la actualidad en que se dinamiza la marcha general para la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, las celulas tienen otra tarea importante de llamar a los militantes del partido y los trabajadores a la materializacion de las politicas del partido, apunto. 
					
					El deber revolucionario mas importante que corresponde hoy en dia a nuestro partido es llevar a la realidad el noble deseo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien emprendio incansablemente hasta el ultimo momento de su vida la marcha superforzada para hacer vivir a nuestro pueblo en las opulencias socialistas, destaco.
					
					Anadio que para imprimir viraje trascendental en la construccion de potencia economica y la vida del pueblo, las organizaciones del partido a todos niveles, especialmente las celulas del partido, deben desempenar magnificamente su papel de brigada de choque y patrulla en la materializacion de las politicas del partido y realizar con osadia los trabajos organizativos y politicos para levantar la ola del patriotismo de Kim Jong Il.
					
					Movilizando a los militantes y las masas medulares, las celulas del partido deben hacer que un hombre ponga en accion a diez personas y estas a cien y que la innovacion de una unidad motive la de otra unidad, instruyo.
					
					Hay que conceder atencion especial a la labor con los jovenes en la movilizacion de las masas a la materializacion de las politicas del partido, enseno.
					
					Prosiguio que hay que avivar mas en todos los sectores y puestos de trabajo las llamaradas de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo y el fervor por la conquista de los niveles  sofisticados, preparados por el Dirigente.
					
					Los secretarios de celula deben trabajar con mas responsabilidad y mejorar su desempeno para que sus celulas cumplan bien con su mision y deber importantes asumidos ante la epoca y la revolucion, recalco.
					
					Al final, Kim Jong Un enfatizo que el Comite Central del PTC esta convencido de que todos los secretarios de celula y los funcionarios del partido cumpliran plenamente con su honrosa mision y deber asumidos ante el partido y la revolucion, bien conscientes de que esta en sus manos la bandera del partido del Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un declara clausurada IV Conferencia de Secretarios de Celula de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un declara clausurada IV Conferencia de Secretarios de Celula de PTC
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronuncio la palabra de clausura de la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					El dijo que la presente conferencia se registrara en la historia del PTC como un conclave que preparo importante jalon para fortalecer por todos los medios el poderio combativo del partido de acuerdo con la demanda de la nueva epoca historica del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y lograr la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					
					La idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il es ciencia y podemos superar todas las pruebas y dificultades y triunfar sin falta si seguimos las instrucciones de ellos, apunto y agrego que esto es la verdad comprobada en la practica de la revolucion coreana. 
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de tomar la idea y las proezas imperecederas del Presidente y del Dirigente realizadas en la construccion del partido como firme guia y remedio omnipotente, consolidar en lo ideo-organizativo el PTC, operar lo todo al estilo de los grandes Generalisimos para registrar incesantes saltos e innovaciones en la revolucion y la construccion. 
					
					Destaco que todos los participantes y los demas secretarios de celula de todo el partido deben poner de pleno manifiesto la vitalidad del presente conclave en las practicas de la construccion de un Estado prospero guardando en lo profundo de sus corazones el espiritu de la conferencia y materializandolo cabalmente en las labores de las celulas del partido.
					
					Expresando la conviccion de que todos los participantes en la conferencia y los secretarios de celula de todo el partido cumpliran con su deber revolucionario en la sagrada lucha por adelantar el futuro de prosperidad uniendose compactamente en torno al Comite Central del PTC, el declaro clausurada la IV Conferencia de los secretarios de celula del PTC.

articles.title: Clausurada IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del PTC
articles.content:
Clausurada IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del PTC
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar las sesiones de la segunda jornada de la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Ante todo intervinieron.
					
					Intervinieron este dia Jo Jong Suk, secretaria de celula del partido en la Empresa de Administracion del Lugar de Batalla Revolucionaria del monte Paektu, Yun Yong Bok, secretario de celula del partido en el Ministerio de Deportes, Yun In Dok, secretario de celula del partido en el Hospital Popular de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Jang Myong Sok, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en el distrito de Sinchon, Ri Man Gon, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, etc.
					
					Luego, presentaron los discursos por escrito Jong U Yong, secretario de celula del partido del taller no. 4 del Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang, Yom Yong Gil, secretario del comite de la organizacion sectorial del partido del taller de herramientas de la Fabrica de Maquinas Textiles de Pyongyang, Jong Kwang Bok, secretario de celula del partido de la Editora del Periodico Rodong Sinmun, y otros. 
					
					Los oradores refirieron unanimemente las proezas de direccion de los Grandes Hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu registradas en los sectores y unidades respectivos, analizaron e hicieron balance de los exitos, experiencias y errores reportados en sus trabajos del pasado. 
					
					Manifestaron la decision de glorificar generacion tras generacion, bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, la idea y las proezas de los grandes Generalisimos realizadas en la construccion del partido, registrar un cambio trascendental en las labores partidistas y contribuir asi al fortalecimiento del PTC como organizacion invicta y unida en torno al centro de la direccion, partido madre vinculado estrechamente con el pueblo y fuerza orientadora de la construccion del Estado prospero. 
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, pronuncio un discurso programatico. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron la maxima gloria y expresaron el mas calido agradecimiento al Mariscal quien preparo el programa imperecedero que permite producir un gran ascenso en la revolucion y la construccion al fortalecer mas en lo ideo-organizativo el PTC, que brilla con los nombres y hazanas de los grandes Generalisimos, y elevar considerablemente su papel directriz.
					
					En el conclave fue aprobado el texto de juramento al PTC.
					
					Kim Jong Un pronuncio la palabra de clausura.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a la presidenta brasilena
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a la presidenta brasilena
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 29 a la presidenta brasilena Dilma Rousseff un mensaje de condolencias con motivo de las grandes perdidas humanas causadas por un incendio ocurrido recientemente en la ciudad de Santa Maria del pais sudamericano.
					El remitente expresa profunda compasion y condolencias a la mandataria, las victimas y sus familiares.

articles.title: EE.UU. causo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. causo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ACNC) -- El 29 de enero de 1958, Estados Unidos declaro oficialmente la introduccion de armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea. 
					Aun despues de aprobado el Tratado de No Proliferacion, EE.UU. no dejo de introducir armas nucleares en suelo surcoreano convirtiendolo en el arsenal nuclear mas grande del Extremo Oriente. 
					
					Desde finales de la decada de 1960, libro incesantemente en el Sur de Corea y su contorno los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de toda indole contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea agravando permanentemente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Ya en el periodo de la pasada guerra coreana, trazo el plan de formar en la Peninsula Coreana un corredor de sustancias radiactivas y realizo la maniobra de ataque nuclear contra la RPDC para el mismo fin. 
					
					Los hechos evidencian que el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana surgio ya hace mas de medio siglo como producto de la politica de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. 
					
					EE.UU. causo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana e imposibilito su solucion llevando al extremo la situacion. 
					
					La RPDC hizo todo lo posible por resolver por via pacifica el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana generado debido a la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Aun despues de que adquiriera el disuasivo nuclear con la determinacion de defender la dignidad y seguridad del pais y nacion desde el creciente chantaje nuclear de EE.UU., ella hizo ingentes esfuerzos por la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana tomandola por su politica nuclear. 
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. vino intensificando constantemente el chantaje nuclear y otros actos hostiles a la RPDC despreciando todos los esfuerzos sinceros de esta ultima y utilizando hasta los derechos internacionales como aparatos para justificar su despotismo y arbitrariedades. 
					
					Recientemente, fabrico la "resolucion de sancion no. 2087" abusando de la facultad de la ONU con el fin de suprimir el derecho independiente de la RPDC al lanzamiento del satelite artificial. 
					
					El imperio persigue el objetivo de asfixiar a la RPDC en lo economico y neutralizarla en lo militar para facilitar la ocupacion de todo el territorio coreano. 
					
					Mientras que no cambie la politica nuclear EE.UU., sera imposible la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					De ahi que sacamos la conclusion final de que la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana no se conseguira antes de que sea desnuclearizado todo el mundo. 
					
					La realidad de hoy ensena la verdad de que la soberania de la patria y nacion la deben defender solo con fuerzas propias. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos impulsaran la construccion de potencia economica, la conquista del cosmos y el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear para la defensa nacional y seguridad estatal orientando estas labores al enfrentamiento total para frustrar las maniobras de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles. 
					
					El mundo vera como la RPDC castiga a las fuerzas hostiles y logra el triunfo final.

articles.title: ACNC demanda al Sur de Corea renunciar su politica fratricida
articles.content:
ACNC demanda al Sur de Corea renunciar su politica fratricida
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ACNC) -- La "resolucion de sancion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aprobada en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU bajo la instigacion del imperio y sus satelites deviene un grave desafio a la soberania y los derechos legitimos de un Estado soberano y muestra el climax de la politica hostil y de la campana conflictiva de las fuerzas hostiles que no desean el elevado prestigio internacional ni el desarrollo economico con fines pacificos de la RPDC. 
					Lo problematico es que la banda de traidores surcoreanos actuo al frente de la aprobacion de la presente "resolucion". 
					
					Tan pronto como la RPDC lanzo la unidad no.2 del satelite "Kwangmyongsong-3", los titeres surcoreanos insistieron en "tomar las fuertes contramedidas" y "ejercer la sancion dura" acusandolo de "provocacion" a la sociedad internacional.
					
					Visitaron a sus amos norteamericano y japones y otros paises vecinos para mendigarles la aprobacion de la "resolucion de sancion" anti--RPDC en la ONU. No satisfechos con esto sometieron atrevidamente a la consideracion de la ONU el "proyecto de sancion sobre el Norte de Corea". 
					
					El proceder asqueroso de la banda titere, carente de la conciencia propia de la nacion, muestra la psicologia de los atemorizados por la fuerza espiritual del pueblo coreano y el inagotable poderio estatal de la RPDC. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos recurren con frenesi a la campana de "sancion" con el fin de mantener el prestigio desgastado del "poder" traidor y continuar la fracasada politica conflictiva anti-RPDC.
					
					De esta manera, la banda titere revelo por si misma a todo el mundo su naturaleza de la horda de traidores y maniacos de confrontacion fratricida que mantienen la vida restante con el servilismo a las grandes potencias y la vendepatria. 
					
					Como ensena la leccion historica, no podemos resolver nada con los perseguidores de la confrontacion fratricida, sino se agravaran mas las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no deben pensar en las  conversaciones con la RPDC antes de renunciar su politica fratricida. 
					
					La "sancion" significa la guerra y la declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC. 
					
					Ya hemos aclarado que responderemos a la provocacion de los maniacos de enfrentamiento con el inmediato contraataque, y a la guerra de agresion con la justa guerra por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					La banda titere debe actuar con prudencia teniendolo presente. 
					
					Los provocadores sufriran solo la venganza implacable.
